application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: *******TPO Walnut Tree T0569********COMMUNAL / SHARED TREES		T1	Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) - Tree on drive, by rear garden of No.9 Twickenham Road	Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 2-3m of new growth. Final height 9m and final overall spread 5m.	T2	Wych Elm (Ulmus glabra) - Outside No. 1A No works required - while the tree is fairly tall with some tight unions. The form of the tree, with some crossing stems and branches, means there is a measure of natural bracing. T3	Ash (Fraxinus excelsior) - Outside No.21 & 23	Lift to 3mFRONT GARDEN @ NO. 6		T4	Walnut (Juglans regia) Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 1-1.5m of new growth. Final height 6m and final overall spread 7m. 	REAR GARDEN @ NO. 6		T5	Cherry (Prunus spp)	Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 2m of new growth. Final height 6m and final overall spread 8m.	T6	Norway Maple (Acer platanoides) Rear of No.6 20% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2-3m to tidy and contain.
